channel.title: Can I Put An Advert On My Client?
channel.description:
Hi, im want to get an advert on my client like the pic below but I dont know if it is even possible let alone how to do it.
Anyone got any ideas ?
[IMG]http://i141.photobucket.com/albums/r57/Warren-Plus/adverts.jpg[/img]
Thanks Brendan

item.title: Can I Put An Advert On My Client?
item.dc:creator: @Yz85Racer Yz85Racer
item.description:
@Yz85Racer wrote:

[quote=“HcoJustin, post:6, topic:231785”]I’m not too sure about this, but add a separate JPanel above it, and make it constantly display a web page. (Just a simple page that has the advert and that is it).

Edit: a JEditorPane looks like it can display HTML, so work on that.

http://java.sun.com/docs/books/tutorial/uiswing/components/editorpane.html[/quote]
THANK YOU! Finally, a correct answer!

Read full topic
item.source: Can I Put An Advert On My Client?

item.title: Can I Put An Advert On My Client?
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

Why not just get a webclient, and above the client just add the advert.

Read full topic
item.source: Can I Put An Advert On My Client?

item.title: Can I Put An Advert On My Client?
item.dc:creator: @HcoJustin HcoJustin
item.description:
@HcoJustin wrote:

I’m not too sure about this, but add a separate JPanel above it, and make it constantly display a web page. (Just a simple page that has the advert and that is it).

Edit: a JEditorPane looks like it can display HTML, so work on that.

http://java.sun.com/docs/books/tutorial/uiswing/components/editorpane.html

Read full topic
item.source: Can I Put An Advert On My Client?

item.title: Can I Put An Advert On My Client?
item.dc:creator: @Brenz Brenz
item.description:
@Brenz wrote:

Yh, basically ive been offered a free VPS if i can get adverts into it.

Adding a banner into the background is quite a nice idea actually but then it would have to be a web client or some sort of background rotation mabye.

Brendan

Read full topic
item.source: Can I Put An Advert On My Client?

item.title: Can I Put An Advert On My Client?
item.dc:creator: @kiamyhelp kiamyhelp
item.description:
@kiamyhelp wrote:

an advertise picture or w.e

if its a webclient u can put a banner. Im sure you can put just a picture of a banner as part of the background.

But if you want like sponsored ull probably have to show them like how many ppl log on your acc per day ect. And if its even worth it for them to pay you.

Read full topic
item.source: Can I Put An Advert On My Client?
